title: Aila Aila Lyrics I Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Aila Aila
Singers: Aditya Rao, Nattiella Di Lucco
Music: AR Rahman
Movie: I
Lyrics: Karky

Aila aila I, Aila aila I
Aila aila I, Aila aila I
Man in vennila

Un pidiyile en uyirum irukka
or urasalil en vergal silirkka
ennil muttakalil koidhaai

Kaalai undhan muththahil vidiyum
naalum unnil thappadhu mudiyum
nee enai menmai seidhaai.

enadhu romaney, siridhu kieeravaa
vizhiyil koorinen, manadhai koora vaa
mugaththai moodiye thirudipoga vaa
neengaadhe, en romane ..

Aila aila I, Aila aila I
Aila aila I, Aila aila I
Man in vennila

konjam konjamaai enai pidhukki
aila aila eduppaayaa.
Thoorigayile enai kiduthi
vinmeengal vellai adippaayaa.

Thuppu thulakka varuvaayaa
muththa sidharalgal hoyaa.
poo illaamal aila
vaasama ooyaa.
nee ingu siruthu vittayaa
adhanaalaa.

Marupadi sirithidida
nilavugal kudhithida
boomiengilum oli.
ini MInasaram panjam
theerpom siru thuli.

Undhan meni engilum enai eduthu
aila aila nee poosa
etti paarththidum kaakkaigalum
kannai moodumey koosa

vaanin vilumbile heyaa
ilamsivappai hoyaa
roja poovil aila
vannaththai
nilavinil saliththeduppen
unakkaaga.

Sarmaththin milirvinil olirvinil
therivadhu dhevadheigalin thiral.
Un keley pookkum vin pookkal
pookkal illa nizhal.

Sakkai ena vaanaththai pizhindhu
indhu kadalin aalaththai kadandhu
naan en kangal kondaen.
aila vizhi neelathai irakki
aandhai ena un marbil uduthu
pei veri unnil kandaen.

idhalil valiyile
noolgal parikkavaa
kadhal thariyile naanum urikkava
pariththi thiriyile
porigal theriikkavaa
